mapper.insert: insert into articles (article, cno, no, article_create_time) values (#{article},#{cno},#{no},#{articleCreateTime});
mapper.select: select `user`.user_name,article,cno,articles.no,article_create_time from `user` join articles on articles.`no`=user.no where articles.cno=#{cno} order by article_create_time desc
mapper.update: update user set password=#{pwd} where no=#{no}
update user set no=#{newNo} where no=#{no};
update user set user_name=#{userName} where no=#{no}
